type="standard"/></views><searchfields/></skootable></components><resources><labels/><javascript><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="createTransactionRoom" cachelocation="false">
var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidTransactionRoomCtrl','createTransactionRoom',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}
window.location.reload();
 
</jsitem><jsitem location="external" name="ApexAjax" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="convert" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];
var userModel = skuid.model.getModel('CurrentUser');
var userRow = userModel.data[0];

try {
    if(appRow.genesis__Expected_Start_Date__c < userRow.loan__Current_Branch_s_System_Date__c) {
        alert('Application start date should not be less than current system date,\nPls click Update Payment Date Button to update');
        $.unblockUI();
        return;
    }
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','convertApplicationToContract',
    {   
        appId : appRow.Id
    });
    alert(ret);
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}
 $.unblockUI();
window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="sendContractForSign" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
	try {
	    var sessionId = sforce.connection.getUserInfo().organizationId + sforce.connection.sessionId.substring(0,15);
        var url = location.href;
        var pathname = location.pathname;
        var index1 = url.indexOf(pathname);
        var index2 = url.indexOf("/", index1 + 1);
        var baseLocalUrl = url.substr(0, index2);
        var apiPartnerServerURL370 = baseLocalUrl + '/services/Soap/u/37.0/'+ sforce.connection.getUserInfo().organizationId;
        
        var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Application');
        var appRow = appModel.data[0];
        
        var canSettingModel = skuid.model.getModel('CANCongaSettings');
        var canSetting = canSettingModel.data[0];

        var guarantorPartyList = skuid.model.getModel('GuarantorAndBroker_Parties');
        var recipients = '';
        var recipientCount = 1;
        
        if(guarantorPartyList) {
            $.each(guarantorPartyList.data, function(i, row) {
                if(row.clcommon__Type__r.Name == 'BROKER') {
                    recipients += '&recipient' + recipientCount + '=' + row.clcommon__Contact__c + '&recipient' + recipientCount + 'role=CC';
                } else {
                    recipients += '&recipient' + recipientCount + '=' + row.clcommon__Contact__c;
                }
                recipientCount++;
            });
        } else {
            alert('There was no Gurantors found');
        }
        
        const emailSubject = canSetting.Conga_Sign_BLA_Subject__c;
        const congSignParams = 'id=' + appRow.Id + recipients + '&emailSubject=' + emailSubject + '&expireOn=' + appRow.CongaExpireOn__c;

        window.open(apiPartnerServerURL370+'/apex/APXT_CongaSign__apxt_sendForSignature?' + congSignParams);
	} catch(err) {
        alert(err);
    }</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updatePaymentDate" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('Application');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

try {
    var ret = sforce.apex.execute('ApplicationButtonController','updateApplicationPaymentDate',
    {   
        applicationId : appRow.Id
    });
    alert(ret);
} catch(err) {
    alert(err);
}
window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="manualStatusPicklistValues" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0], $ = skuid.$;
var entries = [];
var userModel = skuid.model.getModel('CurrentUser');
var userRow = userModel.data[0];
var apprModel = skuid.model.getModel('Application');
var appRow = apprModel.data[0];

console.log('===User Profile=== ' + userRow.Profile.Name);
if(appRow.Type__c == 'Concurrent') {
    entries.push({ value: 'OFFER ACCEPTED', label: 'OFFER ACCEPTED', defaultValue: false });
}
entries.push({ value: 'DOCS IN', label: 'DOCS IN', defaultValue: false });

if(userRow.Profile.Name == 'SalesRep' || userRow.Profile.Name == 'PartnerSalesRep' || userRow.Profile.Name ==  'SalesManager') {
   return entries;
} else {
    entries.push(
        { value: 'DUE DILIGENCE', label: 'DUE DILIGENCE', defaultValue: false},
        { value: 'PENDING DOCS', label: 'PENDING DOCS', defaultValue: false },
        { value: 'READY TO FUND', label: 'READY TO FUND', defaultValue: false },
        { value: 'CLOSED - DECLINED', label: 'CLOSED - DECLINED', defaultValue: false }
    );
    return entries;
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateManualStatusUpdate" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var currentUser = skuid.model.getModel('CurrentUser').data[0];
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('Application');
var application = applicationModel.data[0];

if((application.Type__c == 'New' || application.Type__c == 'Renewal')
    && application.genesis__Status__c == 'CLOSED - APPROVED'
    && currentUser.Profile.Name != 'System Administrator'
){
    applicationModel.cancel();
    alert('You don\'t have permission to manually move this application to Closed Approved.');
}</jsitem></javascript><css/><actionsequences uniqueid="sk-Q0h-501"><actionsequence id="52808f40-17e9-483a-9cd8-bca11bfe410f" label="New Sequence" uniqueid="sk-18xS-494"><actions><action type="blockUI" message="Generating Pricing..."/><action type="custom" snippet="generatePricing"/><action type="unblockUI"/></actions><description/></actionsequence><actionsequence id="26713d4b-23d3-4dfd-93a5-c46fe915d428" label="New Sequence" uniqueid="sk-18xS-495"><actions><action type="blockUI" message="Generating Pricing..."/><action type="custom" snippet="generatePricing"/><action type="unblockUI"/></actions><description/></actionsequence></actionsequences></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles></skuidpage>
